hint1.first: You can rotate a block using the right and left arrows on the keyboard.
hint1.second: Think about a collaborative move. You may need your partner to help you move these blocks.

hint2.first: Try a collaborative move. Ask your partner to help you move a block. Your partner may know the color. You can rotate a block using the right and left arrows on the keyboard.
hint2.second: Try a collaborative move. Ask your partner to help you move a block. Your partner may be able to rotate the block.
